org.whispercomm.c2dm4j.async
Interface AsyncC2dmManager

public interface AsyncC2dmManager

An interface for asynchronously pushing messages to clients via the C2DM service. Configuration details (e.g., providing authentication tokens) are implementation dependent. Implementations should support automated handling of C2DM responses (e.g., exponential backoff and retry on quota exceeded or service unavailable errors) via AsyncHandlers.

A default implementation can be instantiated via AsyncC2dmManagerFactory.

Author:
David R. Bild
See Also:
AsyncC2dmManagerFactory, AsyncHandlers, AsyncHandlersFactory

Method Summary
 Future<Response> pushMessage(Message msg)
          Queues a message to be sent to the C2DM service for delivery to the client specified in the message header.
 

Method Detail

pushMessage

Future<Response> pushMessage(Message msg)
Queues a message to be sent to the C2DM service for delivery to the client specified in the message header. The response or error is accessible via the returned Future when available.

Parameters:
msg - the message to deliver
Returns:
a future for accessing the response from the C2DM service or an exception
